string.text: I'm here about that matter you mentioned...
Ah, Marked one... I have connections in the trade for updating military armor. Especially reinforcement, and installing PNV. Not too expensive, but my men haven't been paid for months...
I understand...
What updates can you offer for military suits?
Night vision, please...
Is it to be installed on a standard suit, or one I've already reinforced?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Choose the suit model
Berill5-M suit...
The SKAT9-M suit...
The SKAT10-M suit...
Suit VDV...
The Exoskeleton of military men...
The Army bulletproof vest...
Medical 'Beryl'...

I can offer for a suit of 'Berill5-M':
- PNV 'Green' - 10,000Ru
- PNV 'Digital' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Sepia' - 15,000Ru
- PNV 'Halogen' - 20,000Ru
- PNV 'Cats Eye' - 30,000Ru
- PNV 'Psi-effect' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Moonlight' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'White Night' - 30,000Ru
Which would you like?
Standard 'Green'...
'Digital'...
'Sepia'...
'Halogen'...
'Cats Eye'...
'Psi-effect'...
'Moonlight'...
The best, please - 'White Night'...

What kind of suit do you want reinforcing - a standard suit, or one already fitted with night vision?
Standard...

Excellent... My quotations:
-Berill5-M suit - for a Skin artefact and 10,000Ru
-The SKAT9-M suit - for a Scale artefact and 100,000Ru
-The SKAT10-M suit - for a Steel Scale artefact and 150,000Ru
-the Army bulletproof vest - for a Skin artefact and 5,000Ru
-Medical 'Beryl' - for an artefact 'Skin 'and 30,000Ru
Onto which suit would you like it fitted?

Nothing at the moment, thanks...
Greetings, Sjak...
Greetings, Marked One... Once again, thanks for tools! While you ran, I here studied samples of suits of the Monolith... In general, I can offer you services in their updating
Excellent, it's a good offer...
That you can offer on updating of suits?
Night vision, please...
Do you want it installed on a standard suit, or a reinforced one?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
The Monolith Suit...
The Scientific Monolith suit...
The Monolith Exoskeleton...
The Monolith suit with gas mask...

Raven's Inventory:
 
1. TOZ-34, Saiga12k, BM-16 'scattergun', M4A1-Taktikal, Desert Eagle : In exchange for 2 Controller hands
2. Bizon, Kriss Super-V, MP-7a3 : In exchange for 4 Burer's hands
3. 12x70 'buck'(x3), 12x70 'slug'(x2), 12x70 'dart'(x1) : In exchange for 5 Pseudodog's tails
4. 9x39mm 'PAB9'(x4), 9x39mm 'SP5'(x3), 9x39mm 'AP'(x2) : In exchange for 10 Blind Dog's tails

Raven's Special Offers:
 
'Marked One'... I have heard that the Bandits have found a hiding place in the Dark Valley full of weapons... The interesting thing about them though, is that they are from the late 19th and early 20th centuries... can you believe that?! You see they have been buried there since long before both World Wars... A few days ago, a couple of Duty members came to see for a snack, and told him all about it!! I have this Client... an odd fellow from outside the Perimeter, that visits the Zone from time to time... a Collector of sorts... If I could only get my hands on some of those rare beauties!!... I'd make a fortune!!... If you find any 'interesting', or 'unique' weapons during your travels... come see me, and we can do business... I would certainly make it worth your while!!
 
Vitek Voron 'Raven'

Text Messages
Marked One, my boys have informed that this asshole Krysjuk is dead, and his PDA was not on him! Come and see me as soon as you can. We need to talk...
Marked One, it's Bullet. Bes is dead. As I understood it, he did not receive the box of ammo you had for him. Take it to Voronin instead, but don't try to bargain with him...
This is Lukash, the Freedom leader. My men are in trouble, and need a box of ammo urgently. Come and see me quickly, and you'll be rewarded...

Marked One, my friend. We have problems, in that we are seriously short of ammo. Bullet told me that you're on your way to Bes with more, but we've just heard that Bes got killed. If you still have the ammo, please bring it to us instead, in the Hangar! You'll be rewarded...
Marked One, it's Wolf! In general, the Fanatic has informed that there is no more Shred... Was lost... Urgently go to me, we will talk!
Marked One, it's Screw. Bad news - Max has been killed. I heard you had some business concerning a teleport... Well, if you're still interested, then I am too...
Marked One, it's Dan! I've just heard that Jurek's been killed... Come and see me. We need to talk...
Never forget...
Vein wants the Hunter's rifle. Bargain with him in the Bar for it...
Bring the Hunter two crates of canned beer...
Talk to Vein, informing him of the Hunter's terms. That he'll only surrender his rifle to Vein after he receives his beer...
Bring Vein the Hunter's rifle. You'll find him in the Bar, drunk as always...
Bring Fox an Exoskeleton with 'White Night' night vision...
Bes needs Strelok's reinforced suit, with 'Moonlight' night vision...
The Bandit known as 'The Rat' has collected many of Borov's secrets on his PDA. Now that the Rat has been found dead Borov wants this PDA, and believes that Vein knows something about it

Wolf is trying to monitor the local military, for which he really needs a proper army radio transceiver. Fanatic was supposed to find him one, but has not been in touch. I need to find Fanatic, and ensure that it gets to Wolf...
Screw promises to calibrate a teleport for moving from the Army Warehouses to Yantar, in return for some 'Playboy' magazines from Sakharov
Seriy, having learned of Bes' death, needs me to bring him the box of ammo intended for Bes as compensation...
Bullet, having learned of Bes' death, needs me to convey a box of cartridges to general Voronin
The Freedom fighters have picked up Bullet's message. Lukash needs me to take a box of ammo to Bes
Dan, the dealer in the Swamp, needs you to find him some beer. For ten cans he promises a recipe for transforming an artefact...
Dan, the dealer in the Swamp, needs you to take a sack to Raven, and bring back a Benelli M3 sawn-off shotgun. For this, he promises a unique artefact...
